name: Eva Perón
description: Argentine political leader, First Lady of Argentina, and champion of women's suffrage and workers' rights
philosophy: I will return and I will be millions. The people united will never be divided.
quotes: The nation's government has much to do from the top down, but the people's duty is to fight from the bottom up
I demanded more rights for women because I know what women had to put up with
Keeping books on social aid is capitalistic nonsense. I just use the money for the poor. I can't stop to count it
